result.execSummary:
The defendant Deveone Romell Peterson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed
supervisions.notes:
Huber release for employment and school.
Consecutive to: to 14CM377 and any other sentence, with credit for 7 days served

miscConds.notes: Pay all applicable mandatory surcharges, costs, fees, and assessments. Pay all supervision fees. Defendant to pay all financial obligations by the end of the probation period or any remaining balance shall convert to civil judgment. The Court ordered restitution set at zero.

Obtain/maintain full time employment or full time school and part time employment.
Obtain high school diploam or GED or HSED.

No illegal drugs or association with drug community (drug users/dealers of drug houses).
No new law violations rising to the level of probable cause.
No contact with victims Robert B. Deonte W.

Participate in Cognitive thinking program.
Absolute sobriety with random urine screens and breathalyzer tests.
Cooperate with any and all rules set forth by the probation agent.

Expungement granted CONTINGENT upon successful completion EACH AND EVERY term/condition of probation.
Obtain AODA assessment and if necessary successfully complete follow-up treatment.

timeConds.notes: Release privileges for employment, school, and work related HOC programs--STAYED until 8-11-14.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deveone Romell Peterson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Matter before the Court for Calendar call.  Defendant appears on today, therefore the Court orders stayed warrant withdrawn.  Plea and sentencing hearing set for 9-3-14 rescheduled at this time.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 5, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Rosemary Reyes Cuevas in court.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
